com.camerontec.catalys.server.adapter.socket

Class SocketMessage

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.camerontec.catalys.server.adapter.socket.SocketMessage

  • public class SocketMessage
extends Object
    Wraps up a message as sent over a socket adapter.
